title: gaurIshAya namastE
sahitya:
gaurIshAya namastE shrI guruguhAdi sannuta varAya


anupallavi

 shauri vidhIndrAdi nutAya shankarI prANanAthAya sUrijanOpAsitAya shUlAyudha dhara shObhitAya


caraNam   shuka sanakAdi dEva hitAya sundara mAyUra nAthAya nirmala hrdaya 
vihArAya nitya shuddha buddha muktAya sakala niSkaLa rUpAya carmAmbara 
dhara shashi shEkharAya sukhatara pravartakAya shuddha cakra nilayAya nityAya
